spec_data.Name: perl-Convert-ASCII-Armour
spec_data.Description:
This module converts hashes of binary octets into ASCII messages
suitable for transfer over 6-bit clean transport channels.  The
encoded ASCII resembles PGP's armoured messages, but are in no way
compatible with PGP.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 09:21:53 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Convert binary octets into ASCII armoured messages
